Package bacnet.datamodel.sequence

Class GenomeNCBI

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacnet.datamodel.sequence.GenomeNCBI
  • public class GenomeNCBI
extends java.lang.Object
    Object containing an entire genome, created from NCBI RefSeq data
    Data for this genome come from: NCBI.fna (for the sequence) NCBI.gff (for Gene, CDS, and ncRNA lists) If it exists some information are added: Rfam.gff (other info) supp info in a .txt file supp info about RAST results in a .txt file For EGD-e only: Srna.xml are read to add to the genome
    Author:
    UIBC

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String PATH_ANNOTATION
      Path for all supplementary information for genome annotation : Database.getInstance().getPath() + "/GenomeNCBI/Annotation/";
      static java.lang.String PATH_GENOMES
      Path for all Genomes : Database.getInstance().getPath() + "/GenomeNCBI/Genomes/";
      static java.lang.String PATH_GENOMES_NEW
      Path for all new Genomes : Database.getInstance().getPath() + "/GenomeNCBI/GenomesNew/"; This might be used if all IDs have been changed on NCBI servers like it was the cas in Sept 2016
      static java.lang.String PATH_HOMOLOGS
      Path for all homologs calculation file : Database.getInstance().getPath() + "/GenomeNCBI/Homologs/";
      static java.lang.String PATH_PHYLOGENY
      Path for all new Genomes : Database.getInstance().getPath() + "/GenomeNCBI/GenomesNew/"; This might be used if all IDs have been changed on NCBI servers like it was the cas in Sept 2016
      static java.lang.String PATH_RAW
      Path for all raw data for Genomes : Database.getInstance().getPath() + "/GenomeNCBI/";

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GenomeNCBI()  
      GenomeNCBI​(java.lang.String genomePath, boolean annotation)
      Create a genome with all chromosomes found If annotation = TRUE , we had the annotation we can found in other fasta files annotation = FALSE, we read only the complete genome + eventual plasmids
